TheloniousMonkfish.name: Crispy Chicken Pad Thai
TheloniousMonkfish.description: Rice noodles with crispy chicken, egg, crushed peanuts, bean sprouts, lime + tamarind juices, coconut sugar.

TheloniousMonkfish.name: Drunken Noodles
TheloniousMonkfish.description: Flat wide noodles, onions, green beans, basil leaves, hot peppers + your choice of chicken, beef, pork, tofu, or shrimp.

TheloniousMonkfish.name: Fried Ice Cream
TheloniousMonkfish.description: Vanilla or green tea ice cream with a fried exterior.

TheloniousMonkfish.name: Frog Prince Roll
TheloniousMonkfish.description: Salmon, mango, and tempura crunch layered with avocado and crowned with spicy snow crab and tobiko salad.

TheloniousMonkfish.name: Mango Fried Rice
TheloniousMonkfish.description: Chicken + shrimps + mango chunks wok-fried with jasmine rice, carrots, cabbages, egg, white onions, scallions, green + red peppers, Indian- curry powder + dried cranberries.

TheloniousMonkfish.name: Red Riding Hood Roll
TheloniousMonkfish.description: Spicy tuna, shrimp tempura + cucumber ensconced in sushi rice + green soy paper, draped with pared scallop + strawberry medallions, topped with black tobiko + drizzled with red berry coulis, 10 pieces.

TheloniousMonkfish.name: Watatsumi Noodles
TheloniousMonkfish.description: Shrimp + scallops wok-fried with udon, string beans, red and green peppers, baby corn, green peas and basil leaves in green curry paste.

DumplingRoom.name: Chicken
DumplingRoom.description: Dumplings steamed with chicken and cabbage.

DumplingRoom.name: Nutella and Banana Dumplings
DumplingRoom.description: Pan-fried dumplings with powdered sugar and cinnamon.

DumplingRoom.name: Papa Chen's Veggie Dumplings
DumplingRoom.description: Pan-fried dumplings with chives, egg, and rice noodles.

MariposaBakery.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
MariposaBakery.description: Grilled chicken sandwich with chipotle aioli, arugula & parmesan pressed.

MariposaBakery.name: Pastrami Sandwich
MariposaBakery.description: Pastrami sandwich with coleslaw and mustard.

MaxBrenner.name: Banana Split Waffle
MaxBrenner.description: Caramelized bananas, vanilla ice cream, sugar krispies, milk chocolate ganaches

MaxBrenner.name: Chocolate Hazelnut Milkshake
MaxBrenner.description: Vanilla ice cream, milk chocolate ganache, chocolate hazelnut spread, milk, and whipped cream.

MaxBrenner.name: Classic European Fondue for Two
MaxBrenner.description: Bananas, strawberries, chocolate chunk cookies, marshmallows, and fluffy chocolate sponge cake that can be dipped in your choice of two chocolate sauces (milk, dark, or white).
